basics.name: Viktoria Benzel
basics.label: IT Project Manager
basics.summary: I’m a project manager with IT experience, passionate about leading projects from concept to completion. An integral part, therefore, is to maintain a close relationship with the cross-functional teams to better understand their requirements and to set common achievable goals. I am constantly trying to improve my skillset and broader knowledge in the area of IT in order for me to effectively communicate with developers and various stakeholders. I find the process to be rewarding, and it has become a newfound passion of mine.

work.summary: As a project manager, I articulate project goals and scope, translate business needs into technical terms and analyse the requirements for achieving project milestones. I'm responsible for managing the implementaion of our IT projects as well as documentation, project scheduling and testing.
highlights: Managing the release of a complete relaunch of the shoop.de platform
Organised and coordinated the implementation of a new administration tool for the sales and support teams.
Coordinating the implementation and release of a new browser toolbar in collaboration with an external partner.
Managing the cooperation with an external testing company and conducting internal testing for the release
Defining requirements into clear specifications for the developer and planning all sprints, including review and backlog refinement
Working with Google Analytics and Cluvio to improve the marketing performance

work.summary: Planning and realisation of political conferences. This included preparation of all conference documents, editorial support, conception and organisation. The events I participated in:
highlights: The 5th Annual Congress "Government & Administration" supported by the Federal Ministry of the Interior
The "Business Congress Germany-Russia & Law in Russia 2017"

work.summary: Coordinating the different teams in Berlin and Moscow as well as day-to-day administration and running of the office.
highlights: Organizing and coordinating internal, external events and meetings
Working closely with various teams and support them with ad-hoc requests
Ensuring smooth invoice management and support the finance team with invoice administration

work.summary: Working for the PR Department with responsibility for research and analysis regarding the economy of Eastern Europe, Russia and Germany.
Student assistant for the project "Threatened Order - Societies under Stress: The USA and the Soviet Union. Transformations within a Global Competition over Political Order, 1975 - 1989."

work.company: Research Centre for East European Studies at the University of Bremen
work.summary: Research assistant for the project "Domestic discourses and foreign policy-making in the Caspian region. The case of export pipelines from Azerbaijan, Kazakhstan and Turkmenistan [2011 - 2013]".
Conception and organisation of cultural events for students, musicians and filmmakers from Europe and Kazakhstan.
Organisation of a round table discussion "Russia's Europe and Europe's Russia" and a summer school for scholarship holders.

education.area: Political science, Religious studies, Slavic studies

education.institution: Moscow State Institute of International Relations

courses: CS50's Web Programming with Python and JavaScript
